title: Linkin Park - Minutes To Midnight [2007][CD+Covers+Video]
description:
LINKIN PARK - MINUTES TO MIDNIGHT, album released May 14th 2007.
Encoded 192Kbps [Lame] mp3. Covers included.

Linkin Park is a band from Agoura Hills, California. They achieved mainstream success in 2000 with their debut album, Hybrid Theory, which has since sold well over fifteen million copies. The band?s following studio album, Meteora also garnered success, topping the Billboard 200?s album charts in 2003. The band?s latest album, &#039;Minutes To Midnight&#039;, was released internationally on May 14th 2007.

&#039;Minutes To Midnight&#039; is Linkin Park&#039;s third studio album, and is the first Linkin Park album to feature all band members on the album cover, to be co-produced by Mike Shinoda, and to receive a parental advisory sticker [excluding &#039;Collision Course&#039;, the mash-up album with Jay-Z].

The first single on the album, &#039;What I&#039;ve Done&#039;, was digitally released on April 3rd 2007 in the UK and April 2nd 2007 in the US. The CD single was released on April 30th 2007. DJ Joe Hahn of the band directed the video for the single, which was shot in the California desert. It features the band performing in the desert, while reflecting on a variety of social issues including global warming, famine, war and destruction.
